snippet: Readers share their views on the second presidential debate from Hofstra University in Hempstead, N.Y. Monica Crowley is a radio talk show host and a contributor to the Fox News Channel.
abstract: Readers share their views on the second presidential debate from Hofstra University in Hempstead, N.Y. Monica Crowley is a radio talk show host and a contributor to the Fox News Channel.

headline.main: Share Your Reactions to the Second Presidential Debate
